- Title: Providence  (2010)  | Plot: This psychological thriller revolves around the lives of two identical sisters, Sarah and Emily. Their paths keep crossing and at one point it looks like they'll finally get together. But the opportunity slips away and they go their separate ways. It takes a tragedy many years later before they're reunited.
